meanings.definition: A person who loves and collects books.
meanings.sent1: The bibliopegist spent hours browsing through antique bookstores.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a dedicated bibliopegist with a vast collection of rare books.
meanings.sent3: The bibliopegist's bookshelves were so full, they had to start stacking books on the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her love for books was so strong, she was like a bibliopegist in a treasure hunt.
meanings.sent5: The bibliopegist's passion for books was as bright as a shining star.

meanings.definition: To engage in the practice of collecting books.
meanings.sent1: She would bibliopegist at every bookstore she visited, always on the lookout for new additions.
meanings.sent2: I bibliopegist as a hobby, constantly searching for unique books to add to my collection.
meanings.sent3: He would bibliopegist so enthusiastically that his friends joked he needed a bigger house for all his books!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to bibliopegist was like a river flowing endlessly towards its goal.
meanings.sent5: The way she would bibliopegist was as if each book held a piece of her heart.
